snippet: Stan Wawrinka was about 2 1/2 hours removed from winning the U.S. Open for his third major championship when he was presented with a question he probably was figuring would be coming....
lead_paragraph: Stan Wawrinka was about 2 1/2 hours removed from winning the U.S. Open for his third major championship when he was presented with a question he probably was figuring would be coming.

headline.print_headline: What We Learned at US Open: Wawrinka Can Pursue Career Slam
headline.main: What We Learned at US Open: Wawrinka Can Pursue Career Slam
